caption:
At Shhh Silk, every detail is intentionally designed to elevate your rest.​​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​​
From the softness of our 100% pure mulberry silk to the hidden YKK Japanese zippers in our pillowcases, every feature has a functional purpose, not just beauty, but true betterment for your sleep and self-care rituals.​​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​​
Why hidden zippers? They’re crafted to stay discreet and secure, keeping your pillow perfectly in place all night long, while maintaining a seamless, luxurious feel. We’ve been using hidden zippers for 10 years, we were the first silk pillowcase in the world to innovate with our hidden zippers so that they would stay on your pillow all night. ​​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​​
Because you deserve products that are thoughtfully made, beautifully designed, and purposefully aligned with the art of rest.​​​​​​​​

Design Fact: YKK stands for Yoshida Kōgyō Kabushiki gaisha (吉田工業株式会社), which translates to Yoshida Manufacturing Corporation. The company was founded in Tokyo, Japan, in 1934 and is now the largest zipper manufacturer in the world. 
​​​​​​​​
#TheArtOfRest #ShhhSilk #IntentionalLiving
